publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-665 Robert Brown: Funding of Scottish Universities—That the Parliament applauds the work and reputation of Scotland’s universities, not least of the University of Glasgow, the University of Strathclyde and Glasgow Caledonian University; welcomes their huge contribution to both education and research in Scotland and the success of the Scottish economy; notes the claim by Universities Scotland in the context of the current spending review for £168 million additional funding over three years, and calls on the Scottish Government to meet this request in full.
S3M-665 Funding of Scottish Universities (lodged on 22 October 2007) Liam McArthur*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Alison McInnes*, Jamie Stone*, Ross Finnie*, Trish Godman*, Jackie Baillie*, Mike Pringle*

S3M-665 Robert Brown: Funding of Scottish Universities—That the Parliament applauds the work and reputation of Scotland’s universities, not least of the University of Glasgow, the University of Strathclyde and Glasgow Caledonian University; welcomes their huge contribution to both education and research in Scotland and the success of the Scottish economy; notes the claim by Universities Scotland in the context of the current spending review for £168 million additional funding over three years, and calls on the Scottish Government to meet this request in full. Supported by: Liam McArthur, Hugh O’Donnell, Alison McInnes, Jamie Stone, Ross Finnie, Trish Godman, Jackie Baillie, Mike Pringle
S3M-665 Funding of Scottish Universities (lodged on 22 October 2007) Tom McCabe*
